009package Ch12_Ransac_Hough.settings;
010
011import java.awt.Color;
012
013/**
014 * Various display settings used in plugins of this package (only).
015 * 
016 * @author WB
017 *
018 */
019public interface RansacDrawSettings {   
020        static double LineStrokeWidth = 0.75;
021        static Color InitialFitColor = Color.red;
022        static Color FinalFitColor = Color.blue;        
023        static Color InlierColor = Color.green.darker();
024        static double InlierRadius = 1.5;
025        static Color RandomDrawDotColor = Color.red;
026        static double RandoDrawDotRadius = 4;
027}
